summary: This document is an agent report providing employment details for Manuel Marti at Polly Perry Stores in New York City during 1964-1965.
summary_one_paragraph: An agent report dated November 21, 1968, provides details on Manuel Marti's employment at Polly Perry Stores located at 33-37 East 17th Street, New York, New York. The report, compiled by Alphonso E. Marshall of the 108th MI Gp (I-SIB), indicates that Marti worked as a Shipping Clerk from September 9, 1964, to February 12, 1965, earning $52.50 per week and was considered eligible for rehire. The information was obtained from Elliot Weiner, Controller at Polly Perry Stores, during an interview on October 14, 1968.
title: [RESTRICTED]
